tasks.task_description: Initialize Next.js 14+ project with TypeScript, App Router, Tailwind CSS, and ESLint/Prettier configuration
Set up Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL schema for User, Course, CourseModule, Order, Subscription, UserProgress models
Configure NextAuth.js with Google, Facebook, GitHub social providers and JWT session handling
Create core API routes for authentication, user management, and session handling
Set up content processing system with gray-matter, remark, and remark-html for markdown rendering
Build course management API endpoints with CRUD operations, filtering, and search functionality
Develop course catalog UI with filtering, search, and responsive course cards
Implement shopping cart functionality with Zustand state management and session persistence
Integrate Razorpay payment gateway with UPI, cards, bank transfer support and webhook handling
Build order management system with status tracking and automatic course access granting
Implement subscription management with tier-based access control and billing cycle handling
Create course player interface with markdown rendering, module navigation, and progress tracking
Build user progress tracking system with completion status and resume functionality
Develop admin dashboard for course creation, editing, publishing, and content management

description: Implementation of CloudNestle Academy Platform - Complete learning management system with Next.js 14+, authentication, course management, payments, subscriptions, and AWS infrastructure
context: Successfully initialized Next.js 14+ project with TypeScript, App Router, Tailwind CSS, ESLint, and Prettier. Created academy-platform directory with all necessary dependencies installed including Prisma, NextAuth.js, Zustand, Zod, React Hook Form, and markdown processing libraries. Set up development environment with proper configuration files.

Successfully set up Prisma ORM with comprehensive PostgreSQL schema including User, Course, CourseModule, Order, OrderItem, Subscription, UserProgress models. Also created NextAuth.js compatible Account, Session, and VerificationToken models. Generated Prisma client and created TypeScript type definitions for the application.

Successfully configured NextAuth.js with Google, Facebook, and GitHub social providers. Created authentication configuration with Prisma adapter, JWT session handling, and custom callbacks. Set up authentication middleware for route protection, created AuthProvider component, and custom useAuth hook. Updated root layout to include authentication context.

Successfully created core API routes for authentication, user management, and session handling. Built API endpoints for user profile management, user courses retrieval, progress tracking with GET/POST operations, and session validation. Created utility functions for API responses and Zod validation schemas for input validation. All routes include proper authentication checks and error handling.

Successfully set up content processing system with gray-matter for frontmatter parsing, remark and remark-html for markdown processing. Created content utilities for processing, validation, and S3 storage integration. Built API routes for content rendering with access control and admin content upload. Created ContentRenderer component with loading states and error handling. Added Tailwind Typography plugin for proper prose styling.

Successfully built comprehensive course management API endpoints with CRUD operations, filtering, and search functionality. Created routes for courses listing with pagination and filtering, individual course management, course modules CRUD, categories listing, and search functionality. Added validation schemas for course and module creation. All endpoints include proper authentication checks for admin operations and public access for course browsing.

Successfully developed comprehensive course catalog UI with filtering, search, and responsive course cards. Created CourseCard component with course details, difficulty badges, and pricing. Built CourseFilters component with search, category, and difficulty filtering. Implemented courses listing page with pagination and loading states. Created individual course detail page with module listing, enrollment options, and course information. Added Tailwind line-clamp plugin for text truncation.

Successfully implemented comprehensive shopping cart functionality with Zustand state management and session persistence. Created cart store with add/remove/clear operations, cart sidebar with Headless UI components, cart button with item count badge, and add to cart hook with server validation. Updated course cards and detail pages to include add to cart functionality. Added header component with navigation and cart integration. Cart data persists across browser sessions using Zustand persist middleware.
